title: Honda Motorcycle & Scooter plans to launch multiple products to take on Hero MotoCorp
description: The company has concluded a study to introduce an entry-level product, where it has limited presence, with CD110. HMSI is also exploring options to grow its footprint in the 150-cc segment, which is seeing increased traction from customers.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
